Module greenfoot_text_controls
Package com.tinocs.greenfoot.text

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • com.tinocs.greenfoot.text.Text
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, TextField
    public class Text
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This class can be used to display text on screen and provides many methods for customizing the appearance of the text.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ted McLeod

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int ALIGN_CENTER
      maintains constant center x value (default behavior).
      static int ALIGN_LEFT
      maintains constant left edge x value.
      static int ALIGN_RIGHT
      maintains constant right edge x value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Text()
      Default constructor.
      Text​(java.lang.Number num)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number as text but default values for all other fields.
      Text​(java.lang.Number num, int size)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number and size.
      Text​(java.lang.Number num, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, and foreground color (text color).
      Text​(java.lang.Number num, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground, greenfoot.Color background)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground and background color.
      Text​(java.lang.Number num, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground, greenfoot.Color background, greenfoot.Color outline)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground color, background color, and outline color.
      Text​(java.lang.Number num, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground, greenfoot.Color background, greenfoot.Color outline, int align)
      Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground color, background color, outline color, and alignment.
      Text​(java.lang.String text)
      Creates a Text object that with the given text but default values for all other fields.
      Text​(java.lang.String text, int size)
      Creates a Text object that with the given text and size.
      Text​(java.lang.String text, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground)
      Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, and foreground color (text color).
      Text​(java.lang.String text, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground, greenfoot.Color background)
      Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground and background color.
      Text​(java.lang.String text, int size, greenfoot.Color foreground, greenfoot.Color background, greenfoot.Color outline)
      Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground color, background color, and outline color.

      Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground color, background color, outline color, and alignment.

    • Field Detail

      • ALIGN_CENTER

        public static final int ALIGN_CENTER
        maintains constant center x value (default behavior). This effectively means don't do anything special since setImage does not change x normally.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALIGN_LEFT

        public static final int ALIGN_LEFT
        maintains constant left edge x value. Will change the x value to maintain the position of the left edge.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALIGN_RIGHT

        public static final int ALIGN_RIGHT
        maintains constant right edge x value. Will change the x value to maintain the position of the right edge.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Text

        public Text()
        Default constructor. Creates a Text object that with defaults values. text: "" size: 60 foreground: null (black) background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text but default values for all other fields. size: 60 foreground: null (black) background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number as text but default values for all other fields. size: 60 foreground: null (black) background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text,
            int size)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text and size. foreground: null (black) background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        size - the font size of the text

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num,
            int size)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number and size. foreground: null (black) background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display
        size - the font size of the text

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, and foreground color (text color). Other values are defaults: background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, and foreground color (text color). Other values are defaults: background: null (clear) outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground and background color. Other values are defaults: outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground and background color. Other values are defaults: outline: null (none) align: center
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background,
            greenfoot.Color outline)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground color, background color, and outline color. Alignment is defaulted to center.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)
        outline - outline color (null means no outline)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background,
            greenfoot.Color outline)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground color, background color, and outline color. Alignment is defaulted to center.
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)
        outline - outline color (null means no outline)

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.String text,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background,
            greenfoot.Color outline,
            int align)
        Creates a Text object that with the given text, size, foreground color, background color, outline color, and alignment.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)
        outline - outline color (null means no outline)
        align - the alignment of the text. valid values are: Text.ALIGN_CENTER, Text.ALIGN_LEFT, Text.ALIGN_RIGHT

      • Text

        public Text​(java.lang.Number num,
            int size,
            greenfoot.Color foreground,
            greenfoot.Color background,
            greenfoot.Color outline,
            int align)
        Creates a Text object that with the given number, size, foreground color, background color, outline color, and alignment.
        Parameters:
        num - the number to display
        size - the font size of the text
        foreground - the foreground color (text color - null means black)
        background - the background color (null means clear)
        outline - outline color (null means no outline)
        align - the alignment of the text. valid values are: Text.ALIGN_CENTER, Text.ALIGN_LEFT, Text.ALIGN_RIGHT
